titleStmt.title: A funerall sermon, preached at the buriall of the Lady Iane Maitlane, daughter to the right noble earle, Iohn Earle of Lauderdail, at Hadington, the 19. of December. 1631. By Mr. I.M. Together with diverse epitaphs, aswell Latine, as English, written by sundry authors
titleStmt.author: I. M., Mr.
Maitland, John, fl. 1617-1637, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [R. Young] the printers to the Kings most excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
